meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking rays.
meanings.sent1: The raylessness of the room made it feel dim and gloomy.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the raylessness of the black hole.
meanings.sent3: The sun seemed to be playing hide-and-seek with its raylessness today.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, banishing the raylessness of the moment.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the beauty of the sunset, emphasizing the raylessness of the horizon.

meanings.sent1: The cave's deep darkness was due to the raylessness within.
meanings.sent2: The photographer captured the stunning raylessness of the eclipse.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved making objects disappear into raylessness.
meanings.sent4: The forest was filled with shadows, creating a sense of raylessness.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds blocked the sun, causing a moment of eerie raylessness.
